channel.title: Need help with npc problem
channel.description:
I have a problem with npcs.
They attack the players in game, and I don't want them too.
So could you tell me how to make it so the npcs don't attack back when they get attacked.
I'm using a 317 server if it matters.
Thx :)

item.title: Need help with npc problem
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Npchandler.java, look for the packet pertaining the NPC ID, and then remove it,
If you know what the packet for aggressive monsters, It’ll be under that.

Read full topic
